Python Koans

08 Mar 2019

Continuing on my journey to learn Python, this weekend I am going to try to smash through as many of these wonderful Python Koans as possible. I'll report back on Sunday evening with whether or not I gained any deep insight into either Python or the nature of human consciousness.
